## PR Quality Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code formatted (Prettier)
- [ ] Lint passes
- [ ] Type check passes

### Tests

- [ ] Unit tests added/updated
- [ ] All tests passing
- [ ] Coverage acceptable

### Stability

- [ ] No breaking changes
- [ ] Build passes
- [ ] No console errors

### Security

- [ ] No secrets committed
- [ ] Input validated

### Docs

- [ ] README updated (if needed)
